CMAKE_MINIMUM_REQUIRED(VERSION 2.8)

INCLUDE(ExternalProject)

SET(CMAKE_MODULE_PATH ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/cmake/modules)

FILE(MAKE_DIRECTORY
    ${THIRDPARTY_DIR}/lib
    ${THIRDPARTY_DIR}/include
    ${THIRDPARTY_DIR}/bin
)

ExternalProject_Add(
    hippomocks
    URL
    https://github.com/dascandy/hippomocks/archive/042b7fc1e7ac6af2475f32b7f5dc33d8688879b7.zip
    URL_MD5 f48124e1fd6ba0d2975fab71ffc621fc
    CONFIGURE_COMMAND ""
    BUILD_COMMAND ""
    INSTALL_COMMAND cp -rf <SOURCE_DIR>/HippoMocks/hippomocks.h ${THIRDPARTY_DIR}/include/
    )
SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(hippomocks PROPERTIES
    EXCLUDE_FROM_DEFAULT_BUILD TRUE
    EXCLUDE_FROM_ALL TRUE)


ExternalProject_Add(
    catch
    URL
    https://github.com/philsquared/Catch/archive/d4e5f184369ce34592bb6f89e793bdb22d1d011a.zip
    URL_MD5  6ace7b9180da6f04b26c844fb6c774c9
    CONFIGURE_COMMAND ""
    BUILD_COMMAND ""
    INSTALL_COMMAND cp -rf <SOURCE_DIR>/single_include/catch.hpp ${THIRDPARTY_DIR}/include/
    )
SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(catch PROPERTIES
    EXCLUDE_FROM_DEFAULT_BUILD TRUE
    EXCLUDE_FROM_ALL TRUE)
